subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Rangers management met with the former Canucks coach Alain Vigneault, considered the top candidate, and also got permission to interview the ex-Sabres coach Lindy Ruff.
snippet: Rangers management met with the former Canucks coach Alain Vigneault, considered the top candidate, and also got permission to interview the ex-Sabres coach Lindy Ruff.
